content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe Trabelsi, thank you for considering my apartment. I have taken note of your interest and would be happy to discuss the rental price. May I ask what your monthly budget is for housing?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My monthly budget is 300 Euros.
